attributes.action: Extend theory expiry date for people that had their test cancelled due to covid
attributes.additional_details: Extend the Theory Expiry date for all that have been affected by their driving test being cancelled due to Covid 19.
attributes.background: The government should take into consideration that people who's driving tests that have been cancelled due to covid 19, should have their Theory Expiry date extend as a good will gesture from the government. Its not our fault our test got cancelled especially if we booked it before the Theory expiry

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558160
